author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
17 years ago saw the launch of Wayland and since then we've seen various distros move over to Wayland, but Ubuntu has acted quite conservatively on this front and they're finally dropping X11 with the next release on the main version.

title: The End Of An Era On Linux
